name: Av and The Seven Magical Crystals
name_original: Av and The Seven Magical Crystals
description:
Av and The Seven Magical Crystals is an adventure game about a witch who wants to find the legendary magical crystals. Made with RPG Maker VX Ace. This game is focused on the story, and exploration with easy puzzle in it. This game have some slight horror theme in it. It's inspired from J.K . Rowling's Harry Potter, Blue Star Entertainment's Witch's Heart, and Astral Shift's Pocket Mirror.

Summary:

Av Darike is a 14 years old witch. One day, she heard a story about the legendary seven magical crystals that can grant any wishes from her friend. Her teacher said, those crystals were inside the abandoned mansion near her school. She's curious and went to the mansion alone by herself. Many things happened after that...

Warnings:

This game doesn't contain horror theme, just slight horror.  It's also contain some blood things. Recommended for 13 or up. (Actually it's okay if you're under 13, but it's only when you're okay with the warnings.)
